channel.title: vscode on Jacob Goldstein's Website
channel.description: Recent content in vscode on Jacob Goldstein's Website

item.title: Switching From VSCode to VSCodium
item.description: 24 Oct 2019 Blogception: a post on VSCodium as it’s being written in VSCodium. I am writing this blog post in VSCodium. What? Is that like VSCode? Yes, it’s basically VSCode minus the corporate bullshit like surveillance and proprietary-licensed binaries. An ode to VSCode VSCode is the best code editor I’ve ever used. It’s actually rather delightful. There, I’ve said it – and I’ve used a lot of editors across 30+ years of programming.
